experiment.name: Differential gene expression in mutants of Arabidopsis FAX1 compared to wild type

description.text: DNA microarray analysis (Affymetrix ATH1 GeneChip) on mutant lines of the gene At-FAX1 (At3g57280) in Arabidopsis thaliana was performed as described in Li et al. (2015). In total we analyzed the following comparisons: (A) flowers: fax1 knockout (n = 5) versus wild type (n = 5); (B) flowers: FAX1 over-expressors (n = 8, 4-times each line ox#2, ox#4) versus wild type (n = 5); (C) stems: fax1 knockout (n = 4) versus wild type (n = 4). Additional files containing processed data are provided (see http://www.ebi.ac.uk/arrayexpress/files/E-MTAB-3090).

bibliography.authors: Li, N., Gügel, I, Giavalisco, P., Zeisler, V., Schreiber, L., Soll, J., and Philippar, K
bibliography.title: FAX1, a novel membrane protein mediating plastid fatty acid export

bibliography.authors: Li N, Gügel IL, Giavalisco P, Zeisler V, Schreiber L, Soll J, Philippar K.
bibliography.title: FAX1, a novel membrane protein mediating plastid fatty acid export.
